description:
In the mysterious oriental fantasy world, Jixia Academy, as the highest institution of learning in the King`s Continent, attracts many students. Here, a group called "Star Team" is a special existence, but they are facing disbandment for some reason. In an accidental help to a schoolmate to solve a mechanical problem, the members of the Star Team used their respective expertise to assist in the battle and resolve the crisis. Captain Yao once again called on the team members to regroup and set off to form a "reply to every request" mutual aid group to help their classmates on campus solve various problems. This season`s story unfolds with the "Star Team", combining the big and small things on the Jixia campus, showing the members` funny and healing daily lives, as well as the precious friendship bonds.
source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

titles.title: Shi Wangzhe A? Di 3 Ji: Youqiubiying Xingzhi Dui
是王者啊？第3季 有求必应星之队
